attributes.action: Stop the abuse of disabled parking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm disabled and I'm fed up of thoughtless morons taking up the spaces I'm entitled to. I'm practically stuck in the house or the car. If I go anywhere during the day, I can't get parked. It's high time the PM introduced heavy fines to such people. 4X4 drivers & women with children are by far the worst abusers.
Sometimes I can't even keep a hospital appointment because all the spaces are used.
  I couldn't get into hospital recently to visit my young daughter because the last space was taken up by a woman with two kids who were perfectly healthy
